messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: LIZZARDS AND HUMANS ARE NOW AT CIVIL WAR LIKE CAPTAIN AMERICA CIVIL WAR AND IT'S COOL AND FIGHT!!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: CRUSADE AGAINST THE LIGGERS, MAKE THEM DROWN IN THIR COLD BLOOD!!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Pirates, your payment is in the vault, you are free to enter and take the cash, we do not care about it anymore.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: because we are recording this for an anime show uwu
